details:
After encountering Google Docs and Figma, I jumped into web development.
My goal is to ensure that people's ideas don't just remain in the imagination.

While I am interested in server-side development, I also use tools such as 
Figma, React, and Sass for smooth communication and prototyping.

I am not hesitant to study and delve into new things to solve problems.
I always keep an eye on the latest trends through Medium.
